summary: Barbie stars in her first holiday movie in this heart-warming adaptation of the classic Dickens story filled with cherished Christmas carols, fabulous fashions and lots of laughs!
cast: Kelly Sheridan|Morwenna Banks|Melissa Lyons|Prudence Edwards|Leanne Araya|Kandyse McClure|Shauntia Fleming|Kathleen Barr|Pam Hyatt|Tabitha St. Germain|Lisa Roth|Gwynyth Walsh|Kelly Bixby|Amelia Henderson|Michael Ann Angone|Fabrice Grover|Tim Fett|Shannon Chan-Kent|Luke Smith|Anthony Fett|Melissa Lloyd|Morgan Roff|Terry Klassen|Chicago Children's Choir
title: Barbie en Un cuento de Navidad
